stories.text:
jrosclient is a pure Java client for ROS which does not require local installation of ROS or any other native libraries.

Latest version of jrosclient supports ROS Noetic and now you can add it as a dependency to your Maven/Gradle projects.

Documentation: http://portal2.atwebpages.com/jrosclient

GitHub repository: https://github.com/lambdaprime/jrosclient
stories.title: Show HN: Jrosclient Java Client for ROS (Robotic Operation System)
When People Listen to Happy Songs, the Market Outperforms

stories.text: It seems that if a piece of tape or a sticker is covering the front facing camera, the phone is unable to light the screen during a phone call to hang up. Bluetooth headsets make it possible to hang up, but what about without an external interface device? Is this because of the way the phone detects being pressed up against a face so that buttons don't get pressed? If so, can it be disabled?
stories.title: Ask HN: How do you hang up a call on Android when the front camera is blocked?
